hymn.title: The last Adam became a life-giving Spirit

layout.singingstanza: The last A -- dam be -- came a life- -- giv -- ing Spir -- it. The Lord is the Spir -- it, the Spir -- it gives life. But He who is joined to the Lord is one spir -- it. Oh, we have been joined to the Lord! We are one spir -- it with Him. The last A -- dam be -- came a life- -- giv -- ing Spir -- it. The Lord is the Spir -- it, the Spir -- it gives life.

lyrics.stanza: The last Adam became a life-giving Spirit. The Lord is the Spirit, the Spirit gives life. But He who is joined to the Lord is one spirit. Oh, we have been joined to the Lord! We are one spirit with Him. The last Adam became a life-giving Spirit. The Lord is the Spirit, the Spirit gives life.
